definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
to follow blindly/to conform slavishly/unthinking obedience
(PRC) flow of people from the countryside into the cities/rural migrant without definite prospects/drifter

blind people touch an elephant (idiom, from Nirvana sutra 大般涅槃經|大般涅盘经[da4 ban1 Nie4 pan2 jing1]); fig. unable to see the big picture/to mistake the part for the whole/unable to see the wood for the trees
to acquire literacy/to throw off blindness

sentences.english: The first importand task in blindness prevention still is the dlimination of cataract blindness.
sentences.chinese: 防盲工作的首要任务仍是根治白内障盲。

sentences.english: They compared the so-called sweet-blind mice to normal mice.
sentences.chinese: 他们用这种“甜味盲”老鼠与正常老鼠做比较。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a blind separation algorithm of non-stationary convolved sounds mixtures.
sentences.chinese: 讨论一种非平稳卷积混合声音信号盲分离算法。

sentences.english: The potential of the main 3 species for biological control of Thrips palmiis is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 中华微刺盲蝽是防治节瓜蓟马前景最大的天敌之一。

sentences.english: A novel criterion of blind equalization is introduced for communication channels.
sentences.chinese: 本文对于通信信道提出了一种新的盲均衡准则。

sentences.english: A blind image watermarking procedure based on the zerotree wavelet is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于零树小波的盲图像水印算法。

sentences.english: And within about ten minutes, even the sweet-blind mice preferred the sugar water.
sentences.chinese: 十分钟之内，“甜味盲”老鼠竟然也喜欢糖水。

sentences.english: This paper proposed a new blind image restoration algorithm based on relevance vector regression(RVR) models.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于关联向量回归模型的盲图像复原算法。

sentences.english: Hellen Keller learned to speak; she was blind and deaf but not .
sentences.chinese: 海伦凯乐学习说话，她又聋又盲，但必不沉默。

sentences.english: From then on , he regarded his blindness as God's special dotage .
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，他认为他的盲是上帝的特别溺爱。

sentences.english: This paper presents a novel blind grayscale digital watermark algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的盲灰度级水印算法。

sentences.english: This paper provides a Blind Equalization Algorithm based on data-reusing Constant Modulus Algorithm (CMA) for short burst signal.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种适用于短突发信号的CMA盲均衡算法。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the retina cecal-ascending colon continent urinary reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价去带可控盲升结肠膀胱术的应用价值。
基于ID的代理盲签名方案。

sentences.english: Traditionally, blind channel identification and equalization are all based on high order statistics.
sentences.chinese: 传统的盲信道辨识和均衡都是基于高阶统计算法。

sentences.english: A new blind beamformer with improved Hopfield network is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种鲁棒的盲神经网络波束形成算法。

definition: vast, with no clear boundary/fig. hazy/indistinct/unclear/confused
to lose one's eyesight/to become blind/blindness
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
person with a poor sense of direction
